name: Inventorysystem
short_description:
We have developed POS System / Inventory Management system for Retail Shops on C#.NET with MSSQL. It covers following features.

• Admin
o Staff Management
o Suppliers & Categories
o VAT Setup
o Units
o Stock
o Add Products with Barcode
o Racking
o Expense Type
o Backup/ Restore DB
• Daily Expense
• Suppliers Stock
o Purchase Order
o Payment Details
o Purchase Stock Adjust
o Return Purchase
o Stock Details
• POS
o POS -1
o POS-2
o POS-3
o Smart POS
o Collect Credit
• Return/ Exchange
• Agent
o Agent Details
o Agent Commission
o Pay Commission
o Commission Report
• Membership Cards
o Dealer Details
o Card Details
o Point Settings
o Issue Card
• Reports
o Sales Report
o Sales Details
o Expense Report
o Trial Balance
o Member Card
o Redeem
o VAT Report
o Best Product
o Credit Due
o Stock Purchased
o Stock Return
o Supplier Payment
o Barcode Print
